text: @RudyGiuliani @Randal68052371 They will not allow him to take questions, and they will use COVID-19 as an excuse for him to not have a face-to-face debate with @realDonaldTrump as they know he'd crash & burn. They will attempt to make the debates Zoom so they can feed Biden the answers.
